title: Why Facebook Stock Surged to a New All-Time High Today
text: Investors are excited about the social media giant's push into e-commerce.

title: Facebook's Acquisition of Instagram Was Illegal: Rep. Cicilline
text: U.S. Representative David Cicilline, a Rhode Island Democrat, discusses his year-long investigation into anti-competitive behavior among big tech companies with Emily Chang on "Bloomberg Technology."

title: 4 Top Stock Trades for Thursday: CRM, NIO, NFLX, FB
text: Salesforce, Nio, Netflix and Facebook were our top stock trades for Thursday. That said, let's see what the charts are trying to tell us now.

title: iPhone software changes will hurt Facebook's advertising business, company warns
text: Facebook says its ability to serve ads to iPhone users will be significantly curtailed by Apple's latest software update.

title: Facebook shares close above $300 per share for first time
text: Facebook Inc. shares closed up 8% to $303.91 in trading Wednesday as the social-networking giant surpassed the mark for the first time.

title: Facebook Claims an Apple iPhone Update Will Damage Ad Sales
text: But Facebook investors don't seem concerned with the potential decline in revenue.

title: Regulations are the biggest risk for large cap tech companies: S&P Global Ratings Lead Tech Analyst
text: S&P Global Ratings Lead Technology Analyst Chris Frank breaks down how federal regulations are the biggest risk for large cap tech companies.

title: Facebook braces for Apple's privacy changes
text: The social network says some iPhone users might see less-relevant ads after Apple updates its mobile operating system.

title: Facebook claims new iPhone update disrupts online advertising business
text: Facebook Inc. FB, +7.58% on Wednesday said privacy updates to Apple Inc.'s AAPL, +1.05% latest operating system have hindered the social-networking company's ability to deliver targeted ads to iPhone owners when they use outside apps.

title: Facebook says Apple iPhone update will hurt ability to target ads
text: Facebook on Wednesday warned developers that a new Apple privacy update would likely harm its ability to get targeted ads in front of iPhone users. The social network said in a blog post that forthcoming changes in Apple’s new iOS 14 iPhone and iPad software could render its Audience Network system “so ineffective on iOS.

title: You will see a recovery in digital advertising: UBS' Eric Sheridan
text: Eric Sheridan of UBS joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss the tech stocks and why some are poised to move even higher.

title: Facebook warns advertisers on changes due to upcoming Apple OS
text: Facebook Inc outlined some changes on Wednesday that might affect advertisers as thousands of iPhone users are expected to upgrade to Apple Inc's upcoming operating system.

title: Facebook warns Apple's iOS 14 could shave more than 50% from Audience Network revenue
text: Facebook had previously warned that iOS 14 could impact its advertising business, but the company's blog post on Wednesday outlined just how specifically that impact could be. The Facebook Audience Network allows mobile software developers to provide in-app advertisements targeted to users based on Facebook's data.

title: Why Facebook's Doubling Down on E-Commerce
text: Facebook introduced new tools for small retailers.

title: Facebook nears $300 per share for first time
text: Facebook Inc. FB, +5.66% shares were up 5% to $295.95 in late-morning trading Wednesday as the social-networking giant neared $300 a share for the first time.

title: Facebook updates Messenger Rooms as Zoom sits at top of the App Store
text: Messenger Rooms, Facebook’s social Zoom competitor, is today rolling out new features aimed at making Rooms easier to both create and discover as well as those for further personalizing your Rooms experience. The changes follow Messenger’s recent slight dip from the top of the U.S.

title: Facebook updates Messenger Rooms to set it apart from Zoom
text: You can now customize your room with personal video backdrops.

title: Facebook could be the next $1 trillion company. Here's how
text: As Facebook hits record highs, one market watcher suggests it could the next stock to join the $1 trillion market cap club.

title: Is This What's Behind the Unstoppable FAANG Stock Rally?
text: Hint: It's not billionaire money managers.

title: Thai minister says clampdown won't stop as Facebook plans to fight order
text: Thailand's digital minister vowed no relent on Wednesday in a crackdown on social media content deemed illegal and said it was unlikely Facebook would follow through on plans to challenge an order to block access to a group critical of the Thai monarchy.

title: BigCommerce Stock Up 333% Since IPO After Latest Instagram Collaboration
text: BigCommerce Holdings Inc (NASDAQ: BIGC) shares surged in the regular and after-hours session Tuesday as the company announced a partnership with social media behemoth Facebook Inc.

title: Facebook Expands E-commerce Features Across Platforms, Shops To Debut On Main App
text: Facebook Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) announced Tuesday it's adding a shop feature to its main social media app as well as expanding live shopping on Instagram Direct and other messaging platforms, to help people "find products from familiar businesses.
